p: In addition, Table 2 shows that the plasma GSH-Px level was significantly higher in the D + TL group in comparison with the D group while plasma GSH-Px and SOD levels decreased in the C + TL group compared with the D + TL group. Furthermore, the serum PON and ARE activities were increased dramatically in the C + TL group in comparison with the control one. In diabetic rats, the activities of PON1 and ARE were decreased significantly compared with the C group
